title: Can't Play On The Japanese Server
body: I moved to a country nearby Japan so I know that the Japanese server is the best to go on. However, I don't understand the language so I don't know what they're trying to tell me when my login fails. And I know the username and password is correct. How do I change the language? Or could someone translate for me? Thanks. I'll send a picture if you can translate Japanese.

replies.body: Our Japanese support team should be able to help with this.  Keep in mind, though, that each region has its own set of [supported languages](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language).  Meaning English is not available on the Japan region.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look, and get your hands back on your account.  See you there!
